16  package org.jboss.hal.testsuite.test.configuration.infinispan.remote.cache.container.configuration;
17  
18  import java.io.IOException;
19  
20  import org.jboss.arquillian.graphene.findby.ByJQuery;
21  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.Random;
22  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.container.WildFlyContainer;
23  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fragment.TabsFragment;
24  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.model.ModelNodeGenerator;
25  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.model.ResourceVerifier;
26  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.test.Manatoko;
27  import org.jboss.hal.testsuite.test.configuration.infinispan.remote.cache.container.AbstractRemoteCacheContainerTest;
28  import org.junit.Test;
29  import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeAll;
30  import org.junit.jupiter.api.Disabled;
31  import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
32  import org.testcontainers.junit.jupiter.Container;
33  import org.testcontainers.junit.jupiter.Testcontainers;
34  import org.wildfly.extras.creaper.core.online.OnlineManagementClient;
35  import org.wildfly.extras.creaper.core.online.operations.Batch;
36  import org.wildfly.extras.creaper.core.online.operations.Operations;
37  import org.wildfly.extras.creaper.core.online.operations.Values;
38  import org.wildfly.extras.creaper.core.online.operations.admin.Administration;
39  
40  import static org.jboss.hal.dmr.ModelDescriptionConstants.NAME;
41  import static org.jboss.hal.resources.CSS.btnDefault;
42  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.container.WildFlyConfiguration.FULL_HA;
43  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.nearCacheAddress;
44  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.remoteCacheContainerAddress;
45  import static org.jboss.hal.testsuite.fixtures.InfinispanFixtures.remoteClusterAddress;
46  
47  @Manatoko
48  @Testcontainers
49  @Disabled // TODO Enable once https://issues.redhat.com/browse/HAL-1904 has been fixed
50  class NearCacheTest extends AbstractRemoteCacheContainerTest {
51  
52      private static final String REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_CREATE = "remote-cache-container-with-near-cache-to-be-created-"
53              + Random.name();
54      private static final String REMOTE_SOCKET_BINDING_NEAR_CACHE_CREATE = "remote-socket-binding-near-cache-create-"
55              + Random.name();
56  
57      private static final String REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_EDIT = "remote-cache-container-with-near-cache-to-be-edited-"
58              + Random.name();
59      private static final String REMOTE_SOCKET_BINDING_NEAR_CACHE_EDIT = "remote-socket-binding-near-cache-edit-"
60              + Random.name();
61  
62      private static final String REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_DELETE = "remote-cache-container-with-near-cache-to-be-deleted-"
63              + Random.name();
64      private static final String REMOTE_SOCKET_BINDING_NEAR_CACHE_DELETE = "remote-socket-binding-near-cache-delete-"
65              + Random.name();
66  
67      @Container static WildFlyContainer wildFly = WildFlyContainer.standalone(FULL_HA);
68      private static OnlineManagementClient client;
69  
70      @BeforeAll
71      static void setupModel() throws Exception {
72          client = wildFly.managementClient();
73          Operations operations = new Operations(client);
74          createRemoteSocketBinding(client, REMOTE_SOCKET_BINDING_NEAR_CACHE_CREATE);
75          createRemoteSocketBinding(client, REMOTE_SOCKET_BINDING_NEAR_CACHE_EDIT);
76          createRemoteSocketBinding(client, REMOTE_SOCKET_BINDING_NEAR_CACHE_DELETE);
77          createRemoteCacheContainer(operations, REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_CREATE,
78                  REMOTE_SOCKET_BINDING_NEAR_CACHE_CREATE,
79                  false);
80          createRemoteCacheContainer(operations, REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_EDIT,
81                  REMOTE_SOCKET_BINDING_NEAR_CACHE_EDIT, true);
82          createRemoteCacheContainer(operations, REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_DELETE,
83                  REMOTE_SOCKET_BINDING_NEAR_CACHE_DELETE,
84                  true);
85          new Administration(client).reloadIfRequired();
86      }
87  
88      private static void createRemoteCacheContainer(Operations operations, String name, String socketBinding,
89              boolean shouldCreateNearCache)
90              throws IOException {
91          String remoteCluster = Random.name();
92          Batch batch = new Batch().add(remoteCacheContainerAddress(name), Values.of("default-remote-cluster", remoteCluster))
93                  .add(remoteClusterAddress(name, remoteCluster),
94                          Values.of("socket-bindings",
95                                  new ModelNodeGenerator.ModelNodeListBuilder().addAll(socketBinding).build()));
96          if (shouldCreateNearCache) {
97              batch.add(nearCacheAddress(name));
98          }
99          operations.batch(batch)
100                 .assertSuccess();
101     }
102 
103     @Test
104     public void enable() throws Exception {
105         navigateToNearCache(REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_CREATE);
106         TabsFragment nearCacheTab = page.getConfigurationTab();
107         toggleNearCache(nearCacheTab);
108         new ResourceVerifier(nearCacheAddress(REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_CREATE), client).verifyExists();
109     }
110 
111     private void navigateToNearCache(String remoteCacheContainerName) {
112         page.navigate(NAME, remoteCacheContainerName);
113         console.verticalNavigation().selectPrimary("rcc-item");
114     }
115 
116     private void toggleNearCache(TabsFragment tabsFragment) {
117         tabsFragment.select("rcc-near-cache-tab");
118         WebElement switchNearCacheElement = tabsFragment.getRoot()
119                 .findElement(ByJQuery.selector("." + btnDefault + ":visible"));
120         console.scrollIntoView(switchNearCacheElement);
121         switchNearCacheElement.click();
122     }
123 
124     @Test
125     public void editMaxEntries() throws Exception {
126         navigateToNearCache(REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_EDIT);
127         crudOperations.update(nearCacheAddress(REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_EDIT), page.getNearCacheForm(),
128                 "max-entries", Random.number());
129     }
130 
131     @Test
132     public void disable() throws Exception {
133         navigateToNearCache(REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_DELETE);
134         TabsFragment nearCacheTab = page.getConfigurationTab();
135         toggleNearCache(nearCacheTab);
136         new ResourceVerifier(nearCacheAddress(REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_DELETE), client).verifyDoesNotExist();
137         new ResourceVerifier(
138                 remoteCacheContainerAddress(REMOTE_CACHE_CONTAINER_NEAR_CACHE_DELETE).and("near-cache", "none"), client)
139                 .verifyExists();
140     }
141 }
